sentences.en: A fire could have been deliberately started to cloak small coordinated troop movements.
sentences.cn: 可能是有人故意放火掩护小规模的部队协同行动。

sentences.en: a Scout troop
sentences.cn: 一队童子军

sentences.en: a troop of monkeys
sentences.cn: 一群猴子

sentences.en: A troop of visitors arrived.
sentences.cn: 一群来访者抵达.

sentences.en: Both countries agreed to withdraw their troops .
sentences.cn: 两国都同意撤军。

sentences.en: He came out with a troop of followers.
sentences.cn: 他带着一大群随从走出来.

sentences.en: I was assigned to Troop A of the 10th Cavalry.
sentences.cn: 我被派往第10骑兵队的A连。

sentences.en: It's going to be some time before the troop recovers its strength.
sentences.cn: 这支部队要过一段时期才能恢复实力.

sentences.en: The enemy troop couldn't make any advance , and neither could they retreat.
sentences.cn: 敌军进退两难.

sentences.en: The general has removed the troop to the front.
sentences.cn: 将军已把这支部队调往前线.

sentences.en: The officer ordered the troop to retire from the action.
sentences.cn: 军官下令将部队撤出战斗.

sentences.en: There are reports of fresh troop movements across the border.
sentences.cn: 有报告说，新近有军队越过边境。

sentences.en: There have been numerous troop movements.
sentences.cn: 部队调动频繁.

sentences.en: There were reports of troop movements.
sentences.cn: 有报道称将要调动军队。

sentences.en: They all trooped back to the house for a rest.
sentences.cn: 他们都成群结队地回房子里休息。

sentences.en: They go to wave their boys off on the troop trains.
sentences.cn: 他们去向部队运输列车上的孩子们挥手送行.

sentences.en: Troop movements can be observed from space by a satellite.
sentences.cn: 借助卫星可以观察到部队的调动.

sentences.en: troops stationed in Hawaii
sentences.cn: 夏威夷的驻军

sentences.en: We reinforce a troop again.
sentences.cn: 我们又增援一支军队.

sentences.en: We were taken in flank by a troop of cavalry.
sentences.cn: 我们翼侧受到一队骑兵的袭击.

words.tran_cn: 骑兵；骑警；伞兵；部队运输船

trans.tran_en: if a group of people troop somewhere, they walk there together in a way that shows they are tired or bored

trans.tran_cn: 成群结队地走，群集，结队
trans.tran_en: if a group of people troop somewhere, they walk there together in a way that shows they are tired or bored
